gameMode.wayacreate.info: Play with voice commands and enhanced abilities!
gameMode.wayacreate.help: Use voice commands to control the game. Say 'WayaCreate says help' for a list of commands.
gameMode.wayacreate.cheats: Cheats are enabled in WayaCreate Mode
gameMode.wayacreate.cheats.info: You can use voice commands to get items, change time, and more!
gameMode.wayacreate.welcome:
§6§lWelcome to WayaCreate Mode!§r
§7Use voice commands to control the game. Say 'WayaCreate says help' for a list of commands.
gameMode.wayacreate.abilities: §aEnhanced abilities activated! You now have increased health, speed, and flight.
gameMode.wayacreate.voice_ready: §aVoice commands are ready! Say 'WayaCreate says help' to begin.
